title: “Pavement” shall mean any Municipal / Government / Semi-Government pavement, and shall include such stretch of pavement as may be considered viable for the purpose of the S
clause_text: “Pavement” shall mean any Municipal / Government / Semi-Government pavement, and shall include such stretch of pavement as may be considered viable for the purpose of the S.R.S.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: “Pavement” shall mean any Municipal / Government / Semi-Government pavement, and shall include such stretch of pavement as may be considered viable for the purpose of the S.R.S.
